display.family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'

copy.family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'

interface.family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Avenir Next', 'Avenir', 'Segoe UI', 'Lucida Grande', 'Helvetica Neue', 'Helvetica', 'Fira Sans', 'Roboto', 'Noto', 'Droid Sans', 'Cantarell', 'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Franklin Gothic Medium', 'Century Gothic', 'Liberation Sans', sans-serif

mono.family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, 'SF Mono', Menlo, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', monospace
